com.bandyer.android_sdk.client

Class BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder

  • com.bandyer.android_sdk.client.BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BandyerSDKClientOptions

    public static class BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder

    Bandyer SDK Client Options Builder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Bandyer SDK Client Options Builder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BandyerSDKClientOptions build()
      Builds and returns client options.
      BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder keepListeningforIncomingCallsInBackground(boolean enable)
      This feature allows Bandyer SDK to keep listening for incoming calls even in background mode. Please Keep in mind that incoming calls during background state should always be routed from push notification to prevent unexpected behaviours and keep battery consumption under control.
      BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder withNotificationConfig(BandyerSDKNotificationConfig notificationConfig)
      Adds to options an object used to customize incoming notifications.
      BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder withNotificationDisplayFormatter(com.bandyer.android_common.fetcher.UserDisplayInfoFormatter notificationDisplayInfoFormatter)
      Adds to options an object used to format data retrieved from user information fetcher.
      BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder withUserInformationFetcher(com.bandyer.android_common.fetcher.UserInformationFetcher userInformationFetcher)
      Adds to options an object used to fetch users information based on user aliases.

      • keepListeningforIncomingCallsInBackground

        public BandyerSDKClientOptions.Builder keepListeningforIncomingCallsInBackground(boolean enable)

        This feature allows Bandyer SDK to keep listening for incoming calls even in background mode. Please Keep in mind that incoming calls during background state should always be routed from push notification to prevent unexpected behaviours and keep battery consumption under control.

        Parameters:
        enable - enable background listening for notifications.
        Returns:
        Builder

      • build

        public BandyerSDKClientOptions build()

        Builds and returns client options.

        Returns:
